Lots of staring at the ceiling last night.
I am admittedly scared of our conversation this AM and assume you have some concerns as well. I am
admitting I am powerless and am praying to my higher power to show me the way to have a peaceful and constructive conversation this morning,
being thoughtful with my actions and words, and treating you with the respect and dignity you deserve.
This, while I ask for grace, cooperation, and maybe even some measure of forgiveness that should not be afforded to me. I pray that we find a way for
that being clear eyed that forgiveness does not mean forgetting. And in our case, it specifically means that destructive words and deeds are never
appropriate, normalized, or permitted again.
I promise I will try and do my best by you and the family as we have a difficult conversation in an effort to start a long healing process and
reunification together. I pray my thoughts and words are guided with best intentions rather than self service, in the best interest of all. I wish you the
best and that your higher power guides you in the way that is right and appropriate for you as well.
